   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to SnakeAI's documentation!
===================================

**SnakeAI** is a Python library for testing reinforcment learning 
capacity on a simple snake game with obstacles. The project is extended to 
test diffusion process as guide.

Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
